item.title: Cyrstal staff (from runescape christmas event)
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

Okay i found out all the models to the crystal staff and tried constructing the item. Here is my item code.

if(i == 1279){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 13946; class8.anInt181 = 13956; class8.anInt169 = -5; class8.anInt194 = 2; class8.anInt190 = 321; class8.anInt165 = 10000; class8.anInt200 = 10000; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Crystal Staff"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A magical staff from the Land of Snow. -woofdawg23".getBytes(); }

And whenever i try picking up the item, my damn client freezes? Please tell me what is wrong with my codeing?

Read full topic
